bug.author: knorthover
bug.summary: PyDeck warning Mapbox API key not set
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Migrated a deck_gl chart to PyDeck API. When page is run get a UserWarning that the Mapbox API key is not set. Old deck_gl_chart() function does not display the warning. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
1: Get a personal mapbox token, Verify it is set using streamlit config show [mapbox] <denchmark-code># Configure Streamlit to use a custom Mapbox token for elements like st.deck_gl_chart and st.map. If you don't do this you'll be using Streamlit's own token, which has limitations and is not guaranteed to always work. To get a token for yourself, create an account at https://mapbox.com. It's free! (for moderate usage levels) # Default: "pk.eyJ1IjoidGhpYWdvdCIsImEiOiJjamh3bm85NnkwMng4M3dydnNveWwzeWNzIn0.vCBDzNsEF2uFSFk2AM0WZQ" # The value below was set in C:\Users\...path...\.streamlit\config.toml token = "pk.eyJ1Ijoia25......................." </denchmark-code>
Run a PyDeck chart, any demo should do Inspect the output from streamlit run app.py in the shell
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
map displays, no message in shell <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Map displays, shell displays a UserWarning <denchmark-code>You can now view your Streamlit app in your browser.
URL: http://localhost:8501
c:\apps\anaconda3\envs\ccadash\lib\site-packages\pydeck\bindings\deck.py:82: UserWarning: Mapbox API key is not set. This may impact available features of pydeck. UserWarning, </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past? yes <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version:0.53.0 Python version: 3.7.3 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? Conda OS version: Windows 10 Browser version: Chrome Version 79.0.3945.117 (Official Build) (64-bit)
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
If needed, add any other context about the problem here. For exmaple, did this bug come from <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io>https://discuss.streamlit.io</denchmark-link> or another site? Link the original source here!
